AppIdentifier.description: Consists of one or more alphanumeric strings, separated by a dot. The strings must be valid uniform type identifiers (UTIs), containing letters (A-Z, a-z), numbers (0-9), hyphens (-), underscores (_) or periods (.).

DisplayName.description: The display name of the app.

Author.description: Application author name. If left empty, then the user account name is used.

BundleVersion.description: The application (or bundle) version. The version must consist of two, three or four numbers separated by dots.
BundleVersion.errorMessage: The version must consist of two, three or four numbers separated by dots.
